content: वलिः --ली {%<ab>f.</ab>%} (Also written बलिः-ली) {@--1@} A fold or wrinkle (on the skin); वलिभिर्मुखमाक्रांतम्. {@--2@} A fold of skin on the upper part of the belly (especially of females, regarded as a mark of beauty); मध्येन सा वेदिविलग्नमध्या वलित्रयं चारु बभार बाला <ls>Ku. 1. 39.</ls> {@--3@} The ridge of a thatched roof. {@--4@} A line made on the body with fragrant unguents.
